abilities.description: Allows the user to create and inject various hormones that can alter the recipient's body in any way desired, effectively 'remodeling a human from the inside out'.
Can transform males into females and vice versa using special hormones.
Can alter skin color, body temperature, and other physical attributes through hormone injection.

Can inject hormones that allow for extremely fast healing by adjusting a person's body from a fatal condition to having a chance of survival, though only those with strong willpower can survive the treatment.
The user can turn their fingers into syringe-like needles to inject hormones into targets, including themselves.

keyMoments.description: Ivankov provides a detailed explanation of the Horm-Horm Fruit's abilities to Bentham, explaining how it can alter skin color, body temperature, sex, and other physical attributes.
keyMoments.significance: First comprehensive explanation of the fruit's powers and applications.

weaknesses.weakness: Healing hormones require extreme willpower from the patient to survive
Standard Devil Fruit weaknesses (sea water, Sea Prism Stone)

reveals.information: Detailed explanation of hormone manipulation capabilities including gender transformation, body temperature control, and physical attribute modification
